articles.title: Apple (NasdaqGS:AAPL) New Product Launch Fails To Prevent 11% Share Price Dip
articles.content: Apple (NasdaqGS:AAPL) launched new products including the MacBook Air and Mac Studio, aiming to capitalize on the enhanced capabilities of its M3 and M4 chips. Despite these advancements, Apple saw a 10.7% decline in its share price over the past week. This movement is notable given that the broader market faced a downturn as well, with major indices like the Nasdaq falling for the fourth consecutive week. Apple's recent corporate developments, such as its substantial U.S. investment plans...
